description:
Join us for PHPSW in July where we've got a couple of great talks lined up and England's match....

We know that many of you love PHP and football. To accommodate England playing in the semi final we are modifying our timings slightly...

**18:30 Talk 1**
**19:00ish Pizza**
**19:10ish: Talk 2**
**20:00 England vs Netherlands**

The talks are:

**DDD and Transitional Architecture**
\- Simon Wallington

Simon will share ideas and patterns that can be used to migrate away from a complex legacy system, while still releasing iteratively.

**PHP + Static = Phanstatic**
\- Tamas Erdelyi

You don’t need a CMS or a progressive JavaScript framework to create your own blog. Welcome to Phanstatic, a small side project of Tamas Erdelyi and yet another static site generator written in pure PHP.

In his talk, Tamas will remind us why the size of websites still matters in 2024. He will also demonstrate how to build and deploy blogs and microsites using this command-line PHP package by creating just a few files and folders. No need to step out of your PHP comfort zone or worry about a new template engine syntax!

\-\-\-\-
SR2 – Socially Responsible Recruitment (https://www.sr2rec.co.uk/) are kindly helping us host this evening. Thanks to them!
title: DDD and Transitional Architecture / PHP + Static = Phanstatic / Football
